Stench.description: Has a 10% chance of making target Pokémon flinch with each hit.

Drizzle.description: Summons rain that lasts indefinitely upon entering battle.

Speed Boost.description: Raises Speed one stage after each turn.

Sturdy.description: Prevents being KOed from full HP, leaving 1 HP instead.  Protects against the one-hit KO moves regardless of HP.

Damp.description: Prevents self destruct, explosion, and aftermath from working while the Pokémon is in battle.

Sand Veil.description: Increases evasion to 1.25× during a sandstorm.  Protects against sandstorm damage.

Static.description: Has a 30% chance of paralyzing attacking Pokémon on contact.

Volt Absorb.description: Absorbs electric moves, healing for 1/4 max HP.

Water Absorb.description: Absorbs water moves, healing for 1/4 max HP.

Oblivious.description: Prevents infatuation and protects against captivate.

Cloud Nine.description: Negates all effects of weather, but does not prevent the weather itself.

Color Change.description: Changes type to match when hit by a damaging move.

Flash Fire.description: Protects against fire moves.  Once one has been blocked, the Pokémon's own Fire moves inflict 1.5× damage until it leaves battle.

Shield Dust.description: Protects against incoming moves' extra effects.

Suction Cups.description: Prevents being forced out of battle by other Pokémon's moves.

Intimidate.description: Lowers opponents' Attack one stage upon entering battle.

Shadow Tag.description: Prevents opponents from fleeing or switching out.

Rough Skin.description: Damages attacking Pokémon for 1/8 their max HP on contact.

Wonder Guard.description: Protects against damaging moves that are not super effective.

Effect Spore.description: Has a 30% chance of inflcting either paralysis, poison, or sleep on attacking Pokémon on contact.

Synchronize.description: Copies burns, paralysis, and poison received onto the Pokémon that inflicted them.

Clear Body.description: Prevents stats from being lowered by other Pokémon.

Natural Cure.description: Cures any major status ailment upon switching out.

Lightning Rod.description: Redirects single-target electric moves to this Pokémon where possible.  Absorbs Electric moves, raising Special Attack one stage.

Serene Grace.description: Doubles the chance of moves' extra effects occurring.

Trace.description: Copies an opponent's ability upon entering battle.

Poison Point.description: Has a 30% chance of poisoning attacking Pokémon on contact.

Magnet Pull.description: Prevents steel opponents from fleeing or switching out.

Rain Dish.description: Heals for 1/16 max HP after each turn during rain.

Sand Stream.description: Summons a sandstorm that lasts indefinitely upon entering battle.

Pressure.description: Increases the PP cost of moves targetting the Pokémon by one.

Thick Fat.description: Halves damage from fire and ice moves.

Early Bird.description: Makes sleep pass twice as quickly.

Flame Body.description: Has a 30% chance of burning attacking Pokémon on contact.

Run Away.description: Ensures success fleeing from wild battles.

Hyper Cutter.description: Prevents Attack from being lowered by other Pokémon.

Pickup.description: Picks up other Pokémon's used and Flung held items.  May also pick up an item after battle.

Hustle.description: Strengthens physical moves to inflict 1.5× damage, but decreases their accuracy to 0.8×.

Cute Charm.description: Has a 30% chance of infatuating attacking Pokémon on contact.

Plus.description: Increases Special Attack to 1.5× when a friendly Pokémon has plus or minus.

Minus.description: Increases Special Attack to 1.5× when a friendly Pokémon has plus or minus.

Forecast.description: Changes castform's type and form to match the weather.

Sticky Hold.description: Prevents a held item from being removed by other Pokémon.

Shed Skin.description: Has a 33% chance of curing any major status ailment after each turn.

Guts.description: Increases Attack to 1.5× with a major status ailment.

Marvel Scale.description: Increases Defense to 1.5× with a major status ailment.

Liquid Ooze.description: Damages opponents using leeching moves for as much as they would heal.

Overgrow.description: Strengthens grass moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max HP or less.

Blaze.description: Strengthens fire moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max HP or less.

Torrent.description: Strengthens water moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max HP or less.

Swarm.description: Strengthens bug moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max HP or less.

Drought.description: Summons strong sunlight that lasts indefinitely upon entering battle.

Arena Trap.description: Prevents opponents from fleeing or switching out.  Eluded by flying-types and Pokémon in the air.

White Smoke.description: Prevents stats from being lowered by other Pokémon.

Air Lock.description: Negates all effects of weather, but does not prevent the weather itself.

Motor Drive.description: Absorbs electric moves, raising Speed one stage.

Rivalry.description: Increases damage inflicted to 1.25× against Pokémon of the same gender, but decreases damage to 0.75× against the opposite gender.

Steadfast.description: Raises Speed one stage upon flinching.

Snow Cloak.description: Increases evasion to 1.25× during hail.  Protects against hail damage.

Gluttony.description: Makes the Pokémon eat any held Berry triggered by low HP below 1/2 its max HP.

Anger Point.description: Raises Attack to the maximum of six stages upon receiving a critical hit.

Unburden.description: Doubles Speed upon using or losing a held item.

Heatproof.description: Halves damage from fire moves and burns.

Simple.description: Doubles the Pokémon's stat modifiers.  These doubled modifiers are still capped at -6 or 6 stages.

Dry Skin.description: Causes 1/8 max HP in damage each turn during strong sunlight, but heals for 1/8 max HP during rain.  Increases damage from fire moves to 1.25×, but absorbs water moves, healing for 1/4 max HP.

Download.description: Raises the attack stat corresponding to the opponents' weaker defense one stage upon entering battle.

Iron Fist.description: Strengthens punch-based moves to 1.2× their power.

Poison Heal.description: Heals for 1/8 max HP after each turn when poisoned in place of damage.

Adaptability.description: Increases the same-type attack bonus from 1.5× to 2×.

Skill Link.description: Extends two-to-five-hit moves and triple kick to their full length every time.

Hydration.description: Cures any major status ailment after each turn during rain.

Solar Power.description: Increases Special Attack to 1.5× but costs 1/8 max HP after each turn during strong sunlight.

Quick Feet.description: Increases Speed to 1.5× with a major status ailment.

Normalize.description: Makes the Pokémon's moves all act normal-type.

Sniper.description: Strengthens critical hits to inflict 3× damage rather than 2×.

Magic Guard.description: Protects against damage not directly caused by a move.

No Guard.description: Ensures all moves used by and against the Pokémon hit.

Stall.description: Makes the Pokémon move last within its move's priority bracket.

Technician.description: Strengthens moves of 60 base power or less to 1.5× their power.

Leaf Guard.description: Protects against major status ailments during strong sunlight.

Klutz.description: Prevents the Pokémon from using its held item in battle.

Mold Breaker.description: Bypasses targets' abilities if they could hinder or prevent a move.

Super Luck.description: Raises moves' critical hit rates one stage.

Aftermath.description: Damages the attacker for 1/4 its max HP when knocked out by a contact move.

Anticipation.description: Notifies all trainers upon entering battle if an opponent has a super-effective move, self destruct, explosion, or a one-hit KO move.

Forewarn.description: Reveals the opponents' strongest move upon entering battle.

Unaware.description: Ignores other Pokémon's stat modifiers for damage and accuracy calculation.

Tinted Lens.description: Doubles damage inflicted with not-very-effective moves.

Filter.description: Decreases damage taken from super-effective moves by 1/4.

Slow Start.description: Halves Attack and Speed for five turns upon entering battle.

Scrappy.description: Lets the Pokémon's normal and fighting moves hit ghost Pokémon.

Storm Drain.description: Redirects single-target water moves to this Pokémon where possible.  Absorbs Water moves, raising Special Attack one stage.

Ice Body.description: Heals for 1/16 max HP after each turn during hail.  Protects against hail damage.

Solid Rock.description: Decreases damage taken from super-effective moves by 1/4.

Snow Warning.description: Summons hail that lasts indefinitely upon entering battle.

Honey Gather.description: The Pokémon may pick up honey after battle.

Frisk.description: Reveals an opponent's held item upon entering battle.

Reckless.description: Strengthens recoil moves to 1.2× their power.

Multitype.description: Changes arceus's type and form to match its held Plate.

Flower Gift.description: Increases friendly Pokémon's Attack and Special Defense to 1.5× during strong sunlight.

Bad Dreams.description: Damages sleeping opponents for 1/8 their max HP after each turn.

Pickpocket.description: Steals attacking Pokémon's held items on contact.

Sheer Force.description: Strengthens moves with extra effects to 1.3× their power, but prevents their extra effects.

Unnerve.description: Prevents opposing Pokémon from eating held Berries.

Defiant.description: Raises Attack two stages upon having any stat lowered.

Defeatist.description: Halves Attack and Special Attack at 50% max HP or less.

Cursed Body.description: Has a 30% chance of Disabling any move that hits the Pokémon.

Healer.description: Has a 30% chance of curing each adjacent ally of any major status ailment after each turn.

Friend Guard.description: Decreases all direct damage taken by friendly Pokémon to 0.75×.

Weak Armor.description: Raises Speed and lowers Defense by one stage each upon being hit by a physical move.

Multiscale.description: Halves damage taken from full HP.

Flare Boost.description: Increases Special Attack to 1.5× when burned.

Harvest.description: Has a 50% chance of restoring a used Berry after each turn if the Pokémon has held no items in the meantime.

Telepathy.description: Protects against friendly Pokémon's damaging moves.

Moody.description: Raises a random stat two stages and lowers another one stage after each turn.

Poison Touch.description: Has a 30% chance of poisoning target Pokémon upon contact.

Regenerator.description: Heals for 1/3 max HP upon switching out.

Sand Rush.description: Doubles Speed during a sandstorm.  Protects against sandstorm damage.

Wonder Skin.description: Lowers incoming non-damaging moves' base accuracy to exactly 50%.

Analytic.description: Strengthens moves to 1.3× their power when moving last.

Illusion.description: Takes the appearance of the last conscious party Pokémon upon being sent out until hit by a damaging move.

Infiltrator.description: Bypasses light screen, reflect, and safeguard.

Mummy.description: Changes attacking Pokémon's abilities to Mummy on contact.

Moxie.description: Raises Attack one stage upon KOing a Pokémon.

Justified.description: Raises Attack one stage upon taking damage from a dark move.

Rattled.description: Raises Speed one stage upon being hit by a dark, ghost, or bug move.

Magic Bounce.description: Reflects most non-damaging moves back at their user.

Sap Sipper.description: Absorbs grass moves, raising Attack one stage.

Prankster.description: Raises non-damaging moves' priority by one stage.

Sand Force.description: Strengthens rock, ground, and steel moves to 1.3× their power during a sandstorm.  Protects against sandstorm damage.

Iron Barbs.description: Damages attacking Pokémon for 1/8 their max HP on contact.

Zen Mode.description: Changes darmanitan's form after each turn depending on its HP: Zen Mode below 50% max HP, and Standard Mode otherwise.

Victory Star.description: Increases moves' accuracy to 1.1× for friendly Pokémon.

Turboblaze.description: Bypasses targets' abilities if they could hinder or prevent moves.

Teravolt.description: Bypasses targets' abilities if they could hinder or prevent moves.

Aroma Veil.description: Protects allies against moves that affect their mental state.

Flower Veil.description: Protects friendly grass Pokémon from having their stats lowered by other Pokémon.

Cheek Pouch.description: Restores HP upon eating a Berry, in addition to the Berry's effect.

Protean.description: Changes the bearer's type to match each move it uses.

Magician.description: Steals the target's held item when the bearer uses a damaging move.

Bulletproof.description: Protects against bullet, ball, and bomb-based moves.

Competitive.description: Raises Special Attack by two stages upon having any stat lowered.

Strong Jaw.description: Strengthens biting moves to 1.5× their power.

Refrigerate.description: Turns the bearer's normal moves into ice moves and strengthens them to 1.3× their power.

Stance Change.description: Changes aegislash to Blade Forme before using a damaging move, or Shield Forme before using kings shield.

Gale Wings.description: Raises flying moves' priority by one stage.

Mega Launcher.description: Strengthens aura and pulse moves to 1.5× their power.

Grass Pelt.description: Boosts Defense while grassy terrain is in effect.

Symbiosis.description: Passes the bearer's held item to an ally when the ally uses up its item.

Tough Claws.description: Strengthens moves that make contact to 1.33× their power.

Pixilate.description: Turns the bearer's normal moves into fairy moves and strengthens them to 1.3× their power.

Gooey.description: Lowers attacking Pokémon's Speed by one stage on contact.

Aerilate.description: Turns the bearer's normal moves into flying moves and strengthens them to 1.3× their power.

Parental Bond.description: Lets the bearer hit twice with damaging moves.  The second hit has half power.

Dark Aura.description: Strengthens dark moves to 1.33× their power for all friendly and opposing Pokémon.

Fairy Aura.description: Strengthens fairy moves to 1.33× their power for all friendly and opposing Pokémon.

Aura Break.description: Makes dark aura and fairy aura weaken moves of their respective types.

Primordial Sea.description: Creates heavy rain, which has all the properties of Rain Dance, cannot be replaced, and causes damaging Fire moves to fail.

Desolate Land.description: Creates extremely harsh sunlight, which has all the properties of Sunny Day, cannot be replaced, and causes damaging Water moves to fail.

Delta Stream.description: Creates a mysterious air current, which cannot be replaced and causes moves to never be super effective against Flying Pokémon.

Stamina.description: Raises this Pokémon's Defense by one stage when it takes damage from a move.

Wimp Out.description: This Pokémon automatically switches out when its HP drops below half.

Emergency Exit.description: This Pokémon automatically switches out when its HP drops below half.

Water Compaction.description: Raises this Pokémon's Defense by two stages when it's hit by a Water move.

Merciless.description: This Pokémon's moves critical hit against poisoned targets.

Shields Down.description: Transforms this Minior between Core Form and Meteor Form.  Prevents major status ailments and drowsiness while in Meteor Form.

Stakeout.description: This Pokémon's moves have double power against Pokémon that switched in this turn.

Water Bubble.description: Halves damage from Fire moves, doubles damage of Water moves, and prevents burns.

Steelworker.description: This Pokémon's Steel moves have 1.5× power.

Berserk.description: Raises this Pokémon's Special Attack by one stage every time its HP drops below half.

Slush Rush.description: During Hail, this Pokémon has double Speed.

Long Reach.description: This Pokémon's moves do not make contact.

Triage.description: This Pokémon's healing moves have their priority increased by 3.

Galvanize.description: This Pokémon's Normal moves are Electric and have their power increased to 1.2×.

Surge Surfer.description: Doubles this Pokémon's Speed on Electric Terrain.

Schooling.description: Wishiwashi becomes Schooling Form when its HP is 25% or higher.

Disguise.description: Prevents the first instance of battle damage.

Battle Bond.description: Transforms this Pokémon into Ash-Greninja after fainting an opponent.  Water Shuriken's power is 20 and always hits three times.

Power Construct.description: Transforms 10% or 50% Zygarde into Complete Forme when its HP is below 50%.

Corrosion.description: This Pokémon can inflict poison on Poison and Steel Pokémon.

Comatose.description: This Pokémon always  acts as though it were Asleep.

Queenly Majesty.description: Opposing Pokémon cannot use priority attacks.

Innards Out.description: When this Pokémon faints from an opponent's move, that opponent takes damage equal to the HP this Pokémon had remaining.

Dancer.description: Whenever another Pokémon uses a dance move, this Pokémon will use the same move immediately afterwards.

Battery.description: Ally Pokémon's moves have their power increased to 1.3×.

Fluffy.description: Damage from contact moves is halved.  Damage from Fire moves is doubled.

Dazzling.description: Opposing Pokémon cannot use priority attacks.

Soul Heart.description: This Pokémon's Special Attack rises by one stage every time any Pokémon faints.

Tangling Hair.description: When this Pokémon takes regular damage from a contact move, the attacking Pokémon's Speed lowers by one stage.

Receiver.description: When an ally faints, this Pokémon gains its Ability.

Power Of Alchemy.description: When an ally faints, this Pokémon gains its Ability.

Beast Boost.description: Raises this Pokémon's highest stat by one stage when it faints another Pokémon.

Rks System.description: Changes this Pokémon's type to match its held Memory.

Electric Surge.description: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to Electric Terrain.

Psychic Surge.description: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to Psychic Terrain.

Misty Surge.description: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to Misty Terrain.

Grassy Surge.description: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to Grassy Terrain.

Full Metal Body.description: Other Pokémon cannot lower this Pokémon's stats.

Shadow Shield.description: When this Pokémon has full HP, regular damage from moves is halved.

Libero.description: Libero changes the Pokémon's type to that of its previously used attack.

Ball Fetch.description: If the Pokémon is not holding an item, it will fetch the Poké Ball from the first failed throw of the battle.

Cotton Down.description: When Ignores moves and abilities that draw in moves.

Propeller Tail.description: Ignores moves and abilities that draw in moves.

Gulp Missile.description: If a Cramorant with Gulp Missile uses Surf or Dive, it catches prey and changes its form depending on its remaining HP.

Stalwart.description: Ignores moves and abilities that draw in moves.

Steam Engine.description: Boosts the Speed stat drastically when the Pokémon is hit by a Fire- or Water-type move.

Punk Rock.description: Boosts sound-based moves and halves damage from the same moves.

Sand Spit.description: Creates a sandstorm when hit by an attack.

Ice Face.description: The Pokémon’s ice head can take a physical attack as a substitute, but the attack also changes the Pokémon’s appearance. The ice will be restored when it snows.

Power Spot.description: Just being next to the Pokémon powers up moves.

Mimicry.description: Changes type depending on the terrain.

Screen Cleaner.description: Nullifies effects of Light Screen, Reflect, and Aurora Veil.

Steely Spirit.description: Powers up ally Pokémon's Steel-type moves.

Perish Body.description: When hit by a move that makes direct contact, the Pokémon and the attacker will faint after three turns unless they switch out of battle.

Wandering Spirit.description: Swaps abilities with opponents on contact.

Gorilla Tactics.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat but only allows the use of the first selected move.

Neutralizing Gas.description: Neutralizes abilities of all Pokémon in battle.

Pastel Veil.description: Prevents the Pokémon and its allies from being poisoned.

Hunger Switch.description: Causes Morpeko to change its form each turn, alternating between Full Belly Mode and Hangry Mode

Quick Draw.description: Enables the Pokémon to move first occasionally.

Unseen Fist.description: Contact moves can strike through Protect/Detect.

Curious Medicine.description: Resets all stat changes upon entering battlefield.

Chilling Neigh.description: Boosts Attack after knocking out a Pokémon.

Grim Neigh.description: Boosts Special Attack after knocking out a Pokémon.

As One Glastrier.description: This Ability combines the effects of both Calyrex’s Unnerve Ability and Glastrier’s Chilling Neigh Ability.

As One Spectrier.description: This Ability combines the effects of both Calyrex’s Unnerve Ability and Spectrier’s Grim Neigh Ability.

Lingering Aroma.description: Contact changes the attacker's Ability to Lingering Aroma.

Seed Sower.description: Turns the ground into Grassy Terrain when the Pokémon is hit by an attack.

Thermal Exchange.description: Raises Attack when hit by a Fire-type move. Cannot be burned.

Anger Shell.description: When the Pokémon's HP drops below half, Anger Shell lowers its Defense and Special Defense but its Attack, Special Attack and Speed are raised.

Purifying Salt.description: Protects from status conditions and halves damage from Ghost-type moves.

Well Baked Body.description: Immune to Fire-type moves, and Defense is sharply boosted.

Wind Rider.description: Gives immunity to wind moves, and causes the Pokémon's Attack to increase by one stage when hit by one.

Guard Dog.description: Boosts Attack if intimidated, and prevents being forced to switch out.

Wind Power.description: When hit by a wind move, the power of the next Electric-type move it uses is doubled.

Zero To Hero.description: Transforms into its Hero Form when switching out.

Commander.description: Goes inside the mouth of an ally Dondozo if one is on the field.

Electromorphosis.description: When hit by an attack, the power of the next Electric-type move it uses is doubled.

Protosynthesis.description: Raises highest stat in harsh sunlight, or if holding Booster Energy.

Quark Drive.description: Raises highest stat on Electric Terrain, or if holding Booster Energy.

Vessel Of Ruin.description: Lowers Special Attack of all Pokémon except itself.

Sword Of Ruin.description: Lowers Defense of all Pokémon except itself.

Tablets Of Ruin.description: Lowers Attack of all Pokémon except itself.

Beads Of Ruin.description: Lowers Special Defense of all Pokémon except itself.

Orichalcum Pulse.description: Turns the sunlight harsh when entering battle, and boosts Attack while active.

Hadron Engine.description: Creates an Electric Terrain when entering battle, and boosts Special Attack while active.

Opportunist.description: Copies stat boosts by the opponent.

Cud Chew.description: Causes the Pokémon to reuse an already consumed Berry at the end of the next turn.

Supreme Overlord.description: Attack and Special Attack are boosted for each party Pokémon that has been defeated.

Costar.description: Copies ally's stat changes on entering battle.

Toxic Debris.description: Scatters poison spikes at the feet of the opposing team when the Pokémon takes damage from physical moves.

Armor Tail.description: Prevents the opponent from using any moves that have priority, such as Quick Attack.

Earth Eater.description: Restores HP when hit by a Ground-type move.

Mycelium Might.description: Status moves go last, but are not affected by the opponent's ability.

Minds Eye.description: The Pokémon ignores changes to opponents' evasiveness, its accuracy can't be lowered, and it can hit Ghost types with Normal- and Fighting-type moves.

Supersweet Syrup.description: Once per battle, when a Pokémon with Supersweet Syrup enters the battle, it lowers the evasion stat of all adjacent opponents by one stage.

Hospitality.description: When a Pokémon with Hospitality enters a battle, it restores HP for an ally by 25%.

Toxic Chain.description: May cause bad poisoning when the Pokémon hits an opponent with a move.

Embody Aspect.description: Embody Aspect boosts a particular stat, depending on the form of a Terastallized Ogerpon

Tera Shift.description: When Terapagos enters the battle, it turns into its Terastal Form until the end of the battle.

Tera Shell.description: All damage-dealing moves that hit the Pokémon when its HP is full will not be very effective.

Teraform Zero.description: As soon as Terapagos assumes its Stellar Form, it will immediately neutralize weather and terrain effects.

Poison Puppeteer.description: Pokémon poisoned by Pecharunt's moves will also become confused.
